name: Video Checkmark
author: Robby Chen

sections.description: This plugin simply adds a new “video” column to the posts admin screen for you to easily track which posts you already have made a video for and which haven’t. Each row contains a checkbox corresponding to each post. The checkbox status (checked or unchecked) is automatically saved on the fly.
sections.installation:
You can either:

  1. Upload unzipped video-checkmark folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin video-checkmark through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. The new Video column can be found in the All Posts page of WordPress admin.
  4. There is no option to configure.

Or:

  1. Search Video Checkmark in the Add New plugin section in WordPress admin and install it.
  2. The new Video column can be found in the All Posts page of WordPress admin.
  3. There is no option to configure.

short_description: Adds a video column on the posts admin page for easier track which posts you've already made video for.
description: This plugin simply adds a new “video” column to the posts admin screen for you to easily track which posts you already have made a video for and which haven’t. Each row contains a checkbox corresponding to each post. The checkbox status (checked or unchecked) is automatically saved on the fly.

upgrade_notice.1.0: This is a initial release. No upgrade is necessary.
